data.title: Platform - Communities
data.text:
Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning

Delve deeper into AI and its applications within organisations. AI encompasses machines' capacity to execute cognitive functions akin to human minds, including perception, reasoning, learning, interaction with the environment, problem-solving, and even creativity. Machine learning is a field within artificial intelligence and computer science dedicated to utilising data and algorithms to enable AI systems to mimic the learning process of humans, progressively enhancing their accuracy over time. Explore further to understand how machine learning operates and how fellow members leverage it within their organisations.

Business Technology Platform (BTP)

Discover more about SAP BTP, which unifies application development and automation, data and analytics, integration, and AI capabilities within a single environment. Learn from other members' experiences, including business processes, faster application development, analytics, and integrations, and boldly running mission-critical innovations on major cloud providers' infrastructure

Cloud

Share experiences and learn from others who have used Cloud. SAP Cloud Platform was a platform-as-a-service created for developing new applications or enhancing existing ones in a secure cloud computing environment. Cloud seamlessly integrates data and business processes

Developer

This group is dedicated to addressing the growing emphasis on technology and developers within the SAP ecosystem and broader enterprise IT landscape. No longer confined to traditional ABAP development, SAP technology and development now encompass a diverse range of technologies, paradigms, and acronyms. This includes Core Data Services (CDS) with support for Node.js and Java, leveraging the Cloud Application Programming Model (CAP) and the Business Application Programming Studio. Additionally, it covers ABAP development in Visual Studio Code (VS Code). By exploring these topics, members gain insights into the evolving landscape of SAP development and equip themselves with the skills needed to thrive in this dynamic environment
